docTitle.titlePart: Über das magnetische Verhalten von CsjMHoFg (M=Na, K, Rb)

titlePage.byline: Institut für Anorganische und Analytische Chemie der Justus-Liebig-Universitat, Gießen

front.note: On the Magnetic Behaviour of CszMHoF* (M = Na, K, Rb)
front.div:
The magnetic behaviour of CsaMHoFe ( M = Na, K, Rb ) has been studied in the temperature
range between 3.2 and 251.3 K. The magnetic data are interpreted by means of a previously
developed model in which the influence of the crystal field is theoretically described by the
angular overlap model. Values of the angular overlap parameters t a ( R ) and t n ( R ) cannot be
determined unequivocally. The energy values of the crystal-field levels of the 6 I% ground state
are calculated.
